body:
Well, many servers have an option when you join to use their resource pack and I think it would be great if avicus used one. 
They could use it to customise things like the in-game shops or kit selectors. 
The pack would be chosen by managers+  and would most likely be a simple one. 

This idea is not complete and is just a recommendation as of now. Please leave any constructive feedback or criticism ^_-
